                          BlackBoxException
        Alter Hbase tables based on the new row class
        Parameters:
        row - the row class
        connection - a active connection to the database
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - database error or exception
        BlackBoxException - com.dydabo.blackbox.blackbox exception if alter fails
